pullRequest.title: Don't interrupt blocking threads when terminating
pullRequest.bodyText:
All processors are required to not block for extended time, the
interrupt isn't needed. It can make the execution termination faster,
but we've had issues with interrupted threads in the past. The latest
instance is in #1946 where the ApacheMQ client, when interrupted during
a commit, subsequently failed at Connection.close() which then leaked
the connection. And in the case of a durable subscriber the job couldn't
start again because the client ID was duplicate.
Fixes #1946

commit.message:
Don't interrupt blocking threads when terminating

All processors are required to not block for extended time, the
interrupt isn't needed. It can make the execution termination faster,
but we've had issues with interrupted threads in the past. The latest
instance is in #1946 where the ApacheMQ client, when interrupted during
a commit, subsequently failed at `Connection.close()` which then leaked
the connection. And in the case of a durable subscriber the job couldn't
start again because the client ID was duplicate.

Fixes #1946
